scripts.test: npm standard --fix && echo "Error: no test specified" && exit 1
scripts.test:lint: npm run lint && npm run lint:fix
scripts.test:all: npm run test:lint && npm run http:start
scripts.test:dev: npm run test:lint && npm run http:dev
scripts.express:all: npm run test:lint && npm run start
scripts.express:dev: npm run test:lint && npm run dev
